Cidr.description: Represents an IPAM custom allocation of a single IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR
Cidr.markdownDescription:
Represents an IPAM custom allocation of a single IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

IpamPoolId.markdownDescription:
Id of the IPAM Pool.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

NetmaskLength.description: The desired netmask length of the allocation. If set, IPAM will choose a block of free space with this size and return the CIDR representing it.
NetmaskLength.markdownDescription:
The desired netmask length of the allocation. If set, IPAM will choose a block of free space with this size and return the CIDR representing it.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement
